name: Gum Girl
description:
Try with a controller!
A: Jump | X: Bubble | DOWN: Recall gum

Keyboard Controls:
WASD: Move
SPACE/L : Jump
K: Blow Bubble
DOWN (hold): Chew (recall bubble gum)

Use your bubble gum to create temporary platforms to solve puzzles and traverse through the cosmic space base. Defeat the treacherous drill in order to save your solar system.

Music by Joel C (@lenkalamari)

For GBJAM 2019.
